testcase.name: shows better efficiency with hardware acceleration
provides recommendations for different use cases
applies frequency scaling based on workload
estimates idle time based on workload
measures energy consumption for different workloads
calculates correct statistics for normal dataset
includes memory usage when profiling enabled
returns lower score for slower operations
assesses quantum resistance for known algorithms
